article.title: Asimov_%28disambiguation%29
article.paragraph: Asimovusually refers toIsaac Asimov, the science fiction writer.

list.listitem: Asimov (crater), an impact crater on Mars, named after Isaac Asimov
5020 Asimov, an asteroid named after Isaac Asimov
Asimov's Science Fiction, an American science fiction magazine named after Isaac Asimov
Asimov's SF Adventure Magazine, a short-lived American science fiction magazine named after Isaac Asimov
Isaac Asimov Awards, three separate awards established in honor of Isaac Asimov

article.heading: See also
